subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: What Will Christianity Look Like in 2100?
description: One-minute skill: What Will Christianity Look Like in 2100?.

hook.text: Fewer Europeans, more Africans. Fewer cathedrals, more megachurches. Christianity in 2100 will look nothing like today.

buildup.text: Projections show Africa and Asia dominating Christian demographics. The faith's center of gravity is moving south.

discovery.text: Online churches, AI pastors, and virtual communion are already being tested. Digital faith is emerging.

twist.text: But the biggest change may be theological. Interfaith dialogue, climate theology, and decolonized readings are rising.

climax.text: Christianity has reinvented itself every few centuries. It will again. The question is what it keeps and what it sheds.

punchline.text: Christianity reinvents every few centuries. The next reinvention has begun.

quiz.question: What trend is shaping Christianity's future?
options: Shifting to Africa/Asia, going digital, and theological evolution
